title: BC服的子服无指令、不能聊天
author: 育碧中国
txt_content:
RT,子服（包括登陆服和生存服一类的）无指令，不能聊天
但是可以/login一类的，也可以使用菜单，有时候能聊天（指服务器重启后立刻进入）
用的核心是Waterfall。但同时BungeeCord也试了试，无果。
能聊天的时候BC端有报错，如下
[16:34:58 INFO]: [/127.0.0.1:50747|SheeShrong_] -> UpstreamBridge has disconnected
[16:35:02 WARN]: Error dispatching event ChatEvent(super=TargetedEvent(sender=SheeShrong_, receiver=net.md_5.bungee.ServerConnection@2c8cc429), cancelled=false, message=2) to listener com.crylegend.bungeeauthmebridge.listeners.PlayerListener@66b7550d
java.lang.NullPointerException: null

        at net.md_5.bungee.protocol.packet.Chat.handle(Chat.java:60) ~[waterfall-318.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:a16947e:318]
        at net.md_5.bungee.netty.HandlerBoss.channelRead(HandlerBoss.java:105) ~[waterfall-318.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:a16947e:318]

        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:377) ~[waterfall-318.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:a16947e:318]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:363) ~[waterfall-318.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:a16947e:318]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:355) ~[waterfall-318.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:a16947e:318]

        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:377) ~[waterfall-318.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:a16947e:318]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:363) ~[waterfall-318.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:a16947e:318]
        at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.fireChannelRead(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:919) ~[waterfall-318.jar:git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:a16947e:318]

[16:35:04 INFO]: [SheeShrong_|/127.0.0.1:50745] <-> ServerConnector [loccy] has connected
[16:35:04 INFO]: [/127.0.0.1:50745|SheeShrong_] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [lobby] has disconnected


SheeShrong_是我的游戏名（好像交代了也没什么用

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
bungeeauthmebridge 不支持1.13及以上客户端进入 
进入会导致输入任何指令及聊天均被阻止

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
删除插件 bungeeauthmebridge 

这个插件好像是有些问题。
